lyrics:
10 contributorsbeautiful excuses lyricsverse 1
i can barely sleep
theres something on my mind
im lying in the dark
im searching hard to find
for the love that we shared
and the life i left behind
theres only beautiful excuses in my eyes yeah

verse 2
i can scream and shout
but whats the point its done
dont try before you learn
fly too close to the sun
youre starting to lose faith
so hold on to your pride
theres only beautiful excuses in my eyes oh

prechorus
what makes an angel fall in love
what makes a good man turn and run
how do you know if shes the one yeah

chorus
iâ€™ve made all the perfect alibis
and ive sugarcoated my disguise
but i cant cover this up with sweet goodbyes no
theres only beautiful excuses in my eyes
you might also likeverse 3
locked up in her thoughts
we havent spoke in days
shes saying that ive changed
still stuck in her ways
i wont pick up the phone
ive said all there is to say
gotta be strong because its wrong for me to stay oh

prechorus
what makes an angel fall in love in love
what makes a good man turn and run and run
how do you know if shes the one yeah

chorus
ive made all the perfect alibis
and ive sugarcoated my disguise
but i cant cover this up with sweet goodbyes no
theres only beautiful excuses in my eyes

bridge
too many beautiful excuses
tell me what the use is
trying to find a way to come back home
how can we correct this if were disconnected
i dont know i dont know

what makes a good man turn and run
how do you know if shes the one
